~25% of the global population has latent #tuberculosis, which means they carry the TB bacteria but don't have the disease. There is a 5-15% likelihood of latent #TB developing into active form. We‚Äôve been battling the spread of TB for over two decades. https://t.co/rH7vdHswQ5
